column2: Legitimacy represents your perceived credibility, devotion to your professed ideals, and respect for the rule of law. Like Prestige, it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.

column2: During the Skirmish phase, the main fleets keep their distance while fighters engage in dogfights.\nSmall ships are at their most vulnerable during this phase, but only ÔΩßYFightersÔΩßW, ÔΩßYDestroyersÔΩßW, and ÔΩßYCombat DronesÔΩßW are able to attack and exploit this.
